title: Fumetsu no Anata e (To Your Eternity)
synopsis: An Orb, known only as It, is cast to Earth to be observed from afar. Capable of changing forms from beings whose reflections It captures, It first becomes a rock and then, due to the rising temperature, moss.
related_anime: ['Fumetsu no Anata e', 'Fumetsu no Anata e: Fushi no Tabiji', 'Fumetsu no Anata e 2nd Season']
voices: ['Kawashima, Reiji', 'Shiraishi, Ryouko', 'Hikisaka, Rie', 'Uchida, Aya', 'Aikawa, Rikako', 'Inagawa, Eri', 'Tsuda, Kenjirou', 'Iwami, Manaka', 'Saiga, Mitsuki']
